CA.name: California
CA.summary: California has comprehensive protections for transgender rights including healthcare access, anti-discrimination laws, and inclusive school policies.

TX.name: Texas
TX.summary: Texas has passed multiple restrictive laws limiting transgender healthcare for minors and transgender student participation in sports.

NY.name: New York
NY.summary: New York provides strong legal protections for transgender individuals including healthcare coverage and anti-discrimination policies.

FL.name: Florida
FL.summary: Florida has enacted several laws restricting transgender rights including healthcare bans and sports participation limits.

WA.name: Washington
WA.summary: Washington state offers comprehensive protections including healthcare access and anti-discrimination laws for transgender residents.
